facts: Deceased P1 was married to P2 and allegedly ill-treated by her parents-in-law. On 29.11.2002, after an altercation, her parents-in-law allegedly poured kerosene and set her on fire. She made a dying declaration, and her parents rescued her. She died soon after. The parents-in-law claim an alibi and suicide. Sessions Court convicted them for murder; High Court acquitted them on appeal.
